# init(edge:)

**Initializer**

Creates a transition that moves the view away, towards the specified edge of the view.

## Declaration

```swift
init(edge: Edge)
```

## Creating the transition

- **edge**: The edge to move the view towards.

items.description: The edge to move the view towards.
